name: Finance Agent
description: An A2A agent specializing in financial analysis, investment recommendations, and economic forecasting.

skills.name: Stock Analysis
skills.description: Receives a stock ticker symbol and provides a brief analysis, including performance metrics and news.

examples.input: Analyze TSLA stock performance over the last quarter.
examples.output: TSLA showed a 15% increase, driven by strong Q3 earnings and production ramp-up...

skills.name: Economic Forecast
skills.description: Generates a short-term economic outlook based on specified parameters (e.g., region, industry).

examples.input: Provide a 6-month economic forecast for the UK tech sector.
examples.output: The UK tech sector is expected to see continued growth, though venture capital funding might stabilize...
